input_text:
Job Title: Travel Foreman / Superintendent - Cctv, Access Control

Location: Nashville, TN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
This is a 100% travel role, looking for several candidates across the nation based out of one of the following areas: Nashville, Atlanta, Phoenix, or Sterling

Top Skills' Details

Leadership/Foreman- Looking for a person that has ran a job with outsourced vendors. Will be doing all the QC work on the project. Trade Coordination- Working with partnered vendor to coordinate installation times and scheduling ordering material, quality assurance, dealing with challenges and building out solutions. Verbal and Written Communication- This job has an excessive amount of reporting associated with it. Must have good communications kills to work with


the trades and GC's and will be responsible for providing daily written/typed updates on where the projects are at.

 ï»¿Description 

TEKsystems is looking for site traveling site Foreman / Superintendents. This person will travel from site to site and help with quality and management of day to day operations in the field. They are responsible for coordination partner vendors for installation, working with other trades to ensure accuracy of their work and keep the project on schedule, ensure that the installation meets the specs of the customers, provide pathways when needed and overall running the project onsite. Looking for candidates that are experienced in CCTV and Access Install in large environment and preferably have ran projects in the past. Verbal and Written communication is very important in this role.

 Skills 

security, Installation, Troubleshooting, Cabling, Install, cctv, access control

 Additional Skills & Qualifications 

Good written and communication skills. This person will need to document daily where the project is and provide that back to the leadership team, heavy documentation and communication.

 About TEKsystems 

We're partners in transformation. We help clients activate ideas and solutions to take advantage of a new world of opportunity. We are a team of 80,000 strong, working with over 6,000 clients, including 80% of the Fortune 500, across North America, Europe and Asia. As an industry leader in Full-Stack Technology Services, Talent Services, and real-world application, we work with progressive leaders to drive change. That's the power of true partnership. TEKsystems is an Allegis Group company.

The company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regards to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any characteristic protected by law.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Travel Foreman / Superintendent - CCTV, Access Control
output_json.summary: A 100% travel role requiring candidates based out of Nashville, Atlanta, Phoenix, or Sterling.
